Description: Reverend Kingbolt - Trans Black Flame Maple Condition: This Kingbolt is in great condition. Serial Number: 29365, Weight: 7.93lbs The Kingbolt RA features a sleek new design, keeping the simple and effective layout. It features a Wilkinson tremolo system that stays in tune without the hassle of a locking nut, and revolutionary Railhammer pickups in the bridge and neck. And now, with a strong and durable roasted maple neck, these guitars will really take your playing to the next level.
